rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative directly modifying a risk-adjective.
statement_text: Newborn elephant seal pups suckle their mothers to feed, so there is little chance of eating infected birds, says team member Marcela Uhart at the University of California, Davis.
Newborn elephant seal pups suckle their mothers to feed, so there is little chance of eating infected birds, says team member Marcela Uhart at the University of California, Davis.
